about_the_game:
Do you have what it takes to manage the perfect restaurant? In What's on the Menu?, you’ll take on the role of a restaurant manager, where every choice you make shapes your success. From purchasing equipment and hiring staff to crafting unique menus and handling unexpected events, the road to becoming the ultimate restaurateur is full of challenges and rewards!

Build and Customize Your Dream Restaurant

Start by designing your restaurant from the ground up. Choose your furniture, appliances, and decor to create a unique atmosphere that will attract customers. Will your restaurant be a cozy French bistro or a trendy New York café? The choice is yours!

Create Mouthwatering Menus

Your restaurant’s menu is the heart of your business. Handpick ingredients, experiment with recipes, and serve dishes that will keep your customers coming back for more. Will you focus on classic comfort foods or adventurous haute cuisine? Balance quality and cost to ensure your restaurant stays profitable while keeping diners satisfied.

Manage Your Team and Operations

Behind every successful restaurant is a well-managed team. Hire the right staff, assign them to key tasks, and keep them motivated as the kitchen heats up. Efficient management is key to serving customers quickly and keeping the business running smoothly.

Tackle Random Events and Challenges

Expect the unexpected! From sudden rushes of customers to surprise health inspections, random events will keep you on your toes. Can you adapt quickly and make the right decisions under pressure?

Progress and Unlock New Recipes

As you grow your restaurant empire, earn research points to unlock new recipes and improve your kitchen. Each new dish brings new challenges, but also new opportunities to impress your guests and increase your restaurant’s reputation.

Key Features

  • Design and customize your restaurant with furniture, decor, and kitchen equipment.

  • Create unique menus by selecting ingredients and crafting dishes that match your restaurant’s style.

  • Hire and manage staff to ensure smooth operations and efficient service.

  • Handle random events like customer rushes, inspections, and more to keep things exciting.

  • Progress through levels, unlocking new restaurants, recipes, and challenges as you advance.

Are you ready to find out What's on the Menu?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® G3250 (dual-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-8350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7770 (1 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 3400G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 550 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

From selecting ingredients and crafting menus to hiring staff and customizing your restaurant, every decision counts. Face random events, unlock new recipes, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate restaurateur!
